name: Zapal
description: Zapal is an IT outsourcing company that provides web and mobile app development, technical audit, DevOps services, UI/UX design, quality assurance services, and IT consulting.

itemListElement.name: Web apps development
itemListElement.description: We provide web app development services to create powerful, custom web applications that meet your business needs.

itemListElement.name: Mobile apps development
itemListElement.description: We develop mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms to help your business reach new heights.

itemListElement.name: Technical audit
itemListElement.description: We perform a technical audit of your website or application to identify any issues and provide recommendations for improvement.

itemListElement.name: DevOps services
itemListElement.description: We provide DevOps services to automate your software delivery process, increase efficiency, and reduce time-to-market.

itemListElement.name: UI/UX Design
itemListElement.description: We design beautiful and intuitive user interfaces for web and mobile applications to enhance user experience and satisfaction.

itemListElement.name: Quality Assurance services
itemListElement.description: We provide quality assurance services to ensure that your web or mobile application meets the highest quality standards.

itemListElement.name: IT Consulting
itemListElement.description: We provide IT consulting services to help businesses optimize their IT infrastructure and processes for maximum efficiency and performance.
